title: WL Martin Plan 24377
summary: Updated builder spec with new renderings, modern styling, and flexible bonus space. Currently being updated with new renders by Joshua.
description: Plan 24377 combines timeless layout with contemporary updates. This two-story design features four bedrooms, flexible bonus space, and an open main level perfect for modern family living. Currently receiving updated architectural renderings to showcase its full potential. The proven floor plan has been builder-tested across hundreds of projects.
